lobbysettings.title: Opcions de la sala
lobbysettings.gamehostonly: Només l'amfitrió de la sala pot canviar això!
lobbysettings.inlobbyonly: Només podeu canviar això a la sala!
lobbysettings.visiononly: Només escoltar gent en la teva visió
lobbysettings.hear_imposters_invents: Escoltar als impostors dins la ventilació
lobbysettings.comms_sabotage_audio: Saboteig de comunicació desactiva la veu
lobbysettings.ghost_only_warning: Aixó desactiva el so per els jugadors vius.
lobbysettings.meetings_only_warning: Aixó desactiva el so per els jugadors vius
lobbysettings.meetings_only_warning2: Només es pot parlar en les reunions activat.

audio.title: Audio
audio.speaker: Altaveu
audio.microphone_sens_warning: Si la sensibilitat és massa baixa potser no funciona

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.nat_fix_warning: This will FIX the nat issues but will add a delay since it is using a server instead of p2p
advanced.voice_server_warning: This option is for advanced users only. Other servers can steal your info or crash CrewLink.

beta.title: BETA/DEBUG
beta.vad_enabled_warning: You won't see who's talking if deactivate.

streaming.title: Streaming settings
streaming.voice_server_comp_warning: It is recommended to just change the voice server to a bettercrewlink voice server https://bettercrewl.ink for example.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.restore_warning: This will reset ALL settings to their default values.
troubleshooting.warning: Not available as host in game!

game.open_error:
Start the game manually. 
(this button is only for steam)
game.error_admin:
Couldn't connect to Among Us.
 Please re-open CrewLink as Administrator.
game.error_unsupport: Your version of Among Us is unsupported by CrewLink.
